class.name: IKOpenCone3D
class.brief_description: A 3D cone used to open the rotation of a ball-and-socket joint in inverse kinematics calculations.
class.description: A open cone is a cone freeing the rotation of a ball-and-socket joint. A open cone is defined as a vector pointing in the direction which the cone is opening, and a radius (in radians) representing how much the cone is opening up.
